title: Benefits: exemption for employer-supported childcare: structure of guidance: contents

details.body:
The guidance is set out in blocks as follows:
**Tax years up to the year ended 5 April 2005**
[EIM21902](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21902.htm) Employer supported childcare: summary of exemptions before and after 5 April 2005
[EIM21905](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21905.htm) Exemption for workplace nurseries to 5 April 2005: overview
[EIM21910](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21910.htm) Meaning of childcare to 5 April 2005
[EIM21915](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21915.htm) Premises provided by the employer: conditions to be met to 5 April 2005
[EIM21920](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21920.htm) Joint provision with other employers: further conditions to 5 April 2005
[EIM21925](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21925.htm) Responsibility for financing to 5 April 2005
[EIM21930](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21930.htm) Responsibility for management to 5 April 2005
[EIM21940](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21940.htm) Conditions relating to the child to 5 April 2005
[EIM21945](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21945.htm) Exclusion where premises used as private dwelling to 5 April 2005
[EIM21950](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21950.htm) Registration requirements to 5 April 2005
[EIM21960](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21960.htm) Requests for pre-transaction rulings
**Commercially marketed nursery schemes to 5 April 2005**
[EIM21970](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21970) Commercially marketed nursery schemes to 5 April 2005
[EIM21971](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21971.htm) Tax consequences of workplace nursery schemes
[EIM21972](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21972.htm) Dealing with approaches from employers
[EIM21973](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21973.htm) Dealing with disputes
**Changes introduced with effect from 6 April 2005**
[EIM21990](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21990) Employer provided childcare: exemptions effective from 6 April 2005
[EIM21995](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM21995.htm) Benefits: exemptions for certain employer provided childcare from 6 April 2005: summary of the new provisions
**Workplace nurseries with effect from 6 April 2005**
[EIM22000](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM22000.htm) Benefits: exemptions: workplace nursery provision from 6 April 2005
[EIM22001](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM22001.htm) Workplace nursery provision from 6 April 2005
[EIM22002](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM22002.htm) Workplace nurseries from 6 April 2005: Condition A
[EIM22003](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM22003.htm) Workplace nurseries from 6 April 2005: Condition B
[EIM22004](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM22004.htm) Workplace nurseries from 6 April 2005: Condition C
[EIM22005](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM22005.htm) Workplace nurseries from 6 April 2005: Condition D
[EIM22006](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM22006.htm) Workplace nurseries from 6 April 2005: partnership requirements: premises on which childcare is provided
[EIM22007](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM22007.htm) Workplace nurseries from 6 April 2005: responsibility for financing and managing the provision of childcare
**Other employer-supported childcare**
[EIM22010](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM22010.htm) Benefits: exemptions: “other childcare” supported by the employer: rules from 6 April 2005
[EIM22011](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM22011.htm) Benefits: exemptions: childcare and childcare vouchers provided by the employer: rules from 6 April 2005: the exempt amount
[EIM20012](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM20012.htm) Benefits: exemptions: childcare and childcare vouchers supported by the employer: rules from 6 April 2011: the exempt amount
[EIM22015](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM22015.htm) Benefits: exemptions: childcare and childcare vouchers: rules from 6 April 2005: conditions: availability to all employees
[EIM22016](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM22016.htm) Benefits: exemptions: other childcare and childcare vouchers: availability to all employees: relevant low-paid employees
**Meaning of important terms**
[EIM22020](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM22020.htm) Benefits: exemptions: childcare and childcare vouchers: rules from 6 April 2005: meaning of “child”, “disabled child” and “patient”
[EIM22025](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM22025.htm) Benefits: exemptions: childcare and childcare vouchers: rules from 6 April 2005: meaning of “parental responsibility”
[EIM22030](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM22030.htm) Benefits: exemptions: childcare and childcare vouchers: rules from 6 April 2005: meaning of “care” and “qualifying childcare”
